      • viewProfile

        @RequestMapping(value="/profile")
public java.lang.String viewProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                       java.security.Principal principal)
        Method to get current user information and bind it to employer's profile page using model. Uses principal object to get username of current user(employer)
        Parameters:
        model - Object on which data from database is set as attributes.
        principal - Object from which username of current user is get.
        Returns:
        name of jsp page for employer's profile

      • addProject

        @RequestMapping(value="/addProject",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addProject(@ModelAttribute(value="newProject")
                                                                                                       Project project,
                                                                                                       org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                       java.security.Principal principal)
        Adds the new project or edited project to database. Validates project before saving to database. Binds the errors of validation to binding result. If binding result has error, redirect to current form to display errors.
        Parameters:
        project - Object bound with spring form for adding or updating project.
        result - Object which will store errors while validating.
        principal - Object from which username of current user is get.
        Returns:
        redirect to employer's profile page

      • skillsBinder

        @InitBinder
public void skillsBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.ServletRequestDataBinder binder)
        Binds the list of ids coming from spring form as skills of project to actual list of skills objects.
        Parameters:
        binder - Object for binding data from web request parameter.
